page.title: 20OTHER SCHOOLS IN HARROW.
page.content:
{ Hatch End High School}has 880 pupils and 58 staff. The age range is from 12 to 16 years. Many subjects are taught to CSE and O-level standard including French, German and Italian. A-levels are taken at one of the four{Sixth {Form Colleges}in Harrow.
{ Harrow College of Further Education offers full and part time courses to young students and adults. The college will merge in 1987 with three Sixth Form Colleges to form three{Tertiary {Colleges.}Courses include English as a Second Language, O- and A-levels, secretarial, business and computer studies as well as crafts and recreational courses. Qualifications to be gained include BTEC, RSA, City and Guilds, diplomas as well as O- and A-levels.
